snippet: The fact that the company acknowledged some responsibility to act against illegal firearm sales is encouraging.
abstract: Editorial acclaims attempts by Facebook to enact some controls to deal with growing complaints that it is being used to facilitate dangerous and illegal gun sales; maintains rules are encouraging and particularly necessary in light of woeful failure of Congress to enact stronger gun safety laws.
